verses.verse: Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> and your spoil <S%H7998><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you.

For I will gather <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to battle; <S%H4421><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be taken, <S%H3947><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> rifled, <S%H8155><s%> and the women <S%H802><s%> ravished; <S%H7693><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into captivity, <S%H1473><s%> and the residue <S%H3499><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Then shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against those <S%H1992><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> as when <S%H3117><s%> he fought <S%H3898><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle. <S%H7128><s%>

And his feet <S%H7272><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> on the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Olives, <S%H2132><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> on the east, <S%H6924><s%> and the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Olives <S%H2132><s%> shall split <S%H1234><s%> in the middle <S%H2677><s%> thereof toward the east <S%H4217><s%> and toward the west, <S%H3220><s%> and there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> valley; <S%H1516><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall remove <S%H4185><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of it toward the south. <S%H5045><s%>

And you shall flee <S%H5127><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> for the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall reach <S%H5060><s%> to Azal: <S%H682><s%> yes, you shall flee, <S%H5127><s%> like as you fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the earthquake <S%H7494><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the saints <S%H6918><s%> with you.
And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that the light <S%H216><s%> shall not be clear, <S%H3368><s%> nor dark: <S%H7087><s%>

But it shall be one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> not day, <S%H3117><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> night: <S%H3915><s%> but it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that at evening <S%H6153><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> it shall be light. <S%H216><s%>

And it shall be in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that living <S%H2416><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> out from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward <S%H413><s%> the former <S%H6931><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of them toward <S%H413><s%> the hinder <S%H314><s%> sea: <S%H3220><s%> in summer <S%H7019><s%> and in winter <S%H2778><s%> shall it be.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be one <S%H259><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> shall be turned <S%H5437><s%> as a plain <S%H6160><s%> from Geba <S%H1387><s%> to Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> and it shall be lifted <S%H7213><s%> up, and inhabited <S%H3427><s%> in her place, <S%H8478><s%> from Benjamin's <S%H1144><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> to the corner <S%H6434><s%> gate, <S%H8179><s%> and from the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananeel <S%H2606><s%> to the king's <S%H4428><s%> winepresses. <S%H3342><s%>

And men shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it, and there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> utter destruction; <S%H2764><s%> but Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be safely <S%H983><s%> inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>

And this <S%H2063><s%> shall be the plague <S%H4046><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5062><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that have fought <S%H6633><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> Their flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall consume <S%H4743><s%> away while they stand <S%H5975><s%> on their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall consume <S%H4743><s%> away in their holes, <S%H2356><s%> and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall consume <S%H4743><s%> away in their mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass in that day, <S%H3117><s%> that a great <S%H7227><s%> tumult <S%H4103><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be among them; and they shall lay hold <S%H2388><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> on the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall rise <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shall fight <S%H3898><s%> at Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about <S%H1157><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> together, gold, <S%H2091><s%> and silver, <S%H3701><s%> and apparel, <S%H899><s%> in great <S%H3966><s%> abundance. <S%H7230><s%>

And so <S%H3651><s%> shall be the plague <S%H4046><s%> of the horse, <S%H5483><s%> of the mule, <S%H6505><s%> of the camel, <S%H1581><s%> and of the ass, <S%H2543><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that shall be in these <S%H1992><s%> tents, <S%H4264><s%> as this <S%H2063><s%> plague. <S%H4046><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that every <S%H3605><s%> one that is left <S%H3498><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall even go <S%H5927><s%> up from year <S%H8141><s%> to year <S%H8141><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles. <S%H5521><s%>

And it shall be, that whoever <S%H834><s%> will not come <S%H5927><s%> up of all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> even on them shall be no <S%H3808><s%> rain. <S%H4306><s%>

And if the family <S%H4940><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> not up, and come <S%H935><s%> not, that have no <S%H3808><s%> rain; there shall be the plague, <S%H4046><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5062><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that come <S%H5927><s%> not up to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles. <S%H5521><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall be the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the punishment <S%H2403><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> that come <S%H5927><s%> not up to keep <S%H2287><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles. <S%H5521><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall there be on the bells <S%H4698><s%> of the horses, <S%H5483><s%> HOLINESS <S%H6944><s%> UNTO THE LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the pots <S%H5518><s%> in the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall be like the bowls <S%H4219><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Yes, every <S%H3605><s%> pot <S%H5518><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and in Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be holiness <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> they that sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of them, and seethe <S%H1310><s%> therein: and in that day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
